item.description: This is a two part event at one of the largest shopping malls in New England, in tax-free New Hampshire just over the MA/NH border. #1. Sign wave 11 AM - 12:30 PM, at intersection of Daniel Webster Highway and Dan Chan St (near the Uno Chicago Grill). We expect to see over 2,000 cars, buses and trucks pass our location during the 90 minute sign wave. #2. Lit Drop 12:30 start. Organizer will distribute packages of lit. Individuals and teams can distribute the lit to parked cars, and people walking in the parking lots, in the following areas: Pheasant Lane Mall, Costco, Toys'R'Us, Royal Ridge Mall, etc. All these shopping areas, and more, are within a few blocks of this location. Over 1,000 pieces of lit will be distributed. A limited number of yard signs will also be made available for placement in the nine Nashua Wards this weekend.
item.name: Nashua NH Pheasant Lane Mall Sign Wave and Lit Drop
